text: Hagi Rekapu nemofo Jonadabu'a mofavre naga'a zamasamino, waini tina oneho huno huzamantege'za one'za neageno eno ama knarera ehanati'ne. Na'ankure nezamafa'ma hia naneke amage ante'naze. Hianagi Nagra rama'a zupa tamagrira tamasami vava hu'na e'noanagi, tamagra Nagri nanekea antahita amagera onte'naze.
